Input Type Default KBM Default X360
Move Dual Axis WASD Left Stick
Look Dual Axis WASD Left Stick
Stance Dual Axis Shift Left Stick Button
Zoom Dual Axis MMB Right Stick Button
Right Combat Button RT RMB
Left Combat Button LT LMB
Melee Button RB E
Action Mode Button LB Q
Datapad Dual Axis Enter Start
Pause Dual Axis Escape Select
Aggressive Button D-Up F
Evasive Button D-Right B
Supportive Button D-Left V
Defensive Button D-Down C
Jump Button A Space
Evade Button B Q
Reload Button X R
Interact Button Y E
